fields.name: Dark Sense
fields.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is completed, Dark Sense activates. While Dark Sense is active, the Killer entering a 24-meter radius around you reveals their aura for 5/7/10 seconds. Once the aura's duration expires, Dark Sense deactivates.

fields.name: Deja Vu
fields.description: The auras of 3 generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you. Gain a 4/5/6% repair speed bonus on the revealed generators.

fields.name: Hope
fields.description: The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings. As soon as the exit gates are powered you gain a 5/6/7% Haste status effect. Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

fields.name: Kindred
fields.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a 8/12/16 meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to you and all other Survivors. While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors' auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a 8/12/16 meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.

fields.name: Lightweight
fields.description: Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible 3/4/5 seconds less than normal, and their spacing is inconsistent.

fields.name: No One Left Behind
fields.description: It is inconceivable to leave someone behind. Once the exit gates are powered, you gain the following effects: 50/75/100% additional Bloodpoints for healing and unhooking other Survivors. 30/40/50% bonus action speed when healing and unhooking other Survivors. When unhooking a Survivor, they gain a 7% movement bonus for 10 seconds. The auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.

fields.name: Plunderer's Instinct
fields.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of unopened chests and items in the environment are revealed to you when standing within a 16/24/32 meter range. Grants a considerably better chance at finding an item of higher rarity from chests.

fields.name: Premonition
fields.description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of the Killer in a 45 degree cone within a range of 36 meters. Premonition has a cooldown of 60/45/30 seconds each time it activates.

fields.name: Resilience
fields.description: You are motivated in dire situations. Grants 3/6/9% additional speed when repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing or blessing a Totem, opening exit gates, and unlocking while injured.

fields.name: Slippery Meat
fields.description: You have developed an efficient way to get off hooks. Grants up to 3 extra escape attempts on the hook. Hook escape attempts have a 2/3/4% increased chance to succeed.

fields.name: Small Game
fields.description: You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45-degree cone within a range of 8/10/12 meters. Small Game has a cooldown of 14/12/10 seconds each time it activates. For each Dull Totem and Hex Totem cleansed by any player, gain a Token. Small Game's detection cone is reduced by 5 degrees per token.

fields.name: Spine Chill
fields.description: An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom. Get notified when the Killer is looking at you with a clear line of sight within a 36-meter range. Your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, cleansing, blessing, opening exit gates and unlocking is increased by 2/4/6%. The effects of Spine Chill linger for 0.5 seconds after the Killer looks away or is out of range.

fields.name: This Is Not Happening
fields.description: You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress. Great Skill Check success zones when repairing and healing get 10/20/30% bigger when you are injured.

fields.name: We'll Make It
fields.description: Helping others heightens your morale. When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a 100% speed increase while healing others for 30/60/90 seconds.

fields.name: Bond
fields.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a 20/28/36 meter range.

fields.name: Leader
fields.description: You're able to organize a team to cooperate more efficiently. Increases other Survivors' healing, sabotage, unhooking, cleansing, opening Exit Gates, and chest unlocking speeds by 15/20/25% when they are within a 8 meter range from you. Survivors can only be affected by one Leader effect at a time. This effect persists on other Survivors for 15 seconds after leaving the Leader's effective perk range.

fields.name: Prove Thyself
fields.description: For every other Survivor working on a generator within a 4 meter range, gain 6/8/10% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range. Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.

fields.name: Adrenaline
fields.description: You are fuelled by unexpected energy when on the verge of escape. This perk activates when the exit gates are powered. Instantly heal one health state if you are injured or in the dying state and sprint at 150% of your normal running speed for 3 seconds. Adrenaline ignores the Exhausted status effect. Causes the Exhausted status effect for 60/50/40 seconds. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

fields.name: Quick & Quiet
fields.description: You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers. The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by 100%. This effect can only trigger once every 30/25/20 seconds.

fields.name: Sprint Burst
fields.description: When starting to run, break into a sprint at 150% of your normal running speed for a maximum of 3 seconds. Causes the Exhausted status effect for 60/50/40 seconds. Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted. You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.
